law_explanation: The text contains numerous scenes of murder, graphic violence (e.g., a bullet striking a person), and weapons usage. According to Article 10 of the Russian law, content with graphic depiction of violence is prohibited for audiences under 18 and is only permissible for 16+ if it is non-naturalistic and does not show the killing or injury process. The violated sentences and labels_summary confirm the presence of explicit violent and criminal activity, which exceeds the limits for 16+. Therefore the most restrictive rating justified by the content is 18+.
